content: this is the written pattern of my lemon drawstring pattern please note that a video tutorial already exist on my youtube channel this is a paid pattern but you can watch for free the video tutorial for this bag on my youtube channel here https //www youtube com/watch v=ueg0rfvjtfk the bag is around 16 2 cm tall you will need 2 colors of yarn green and yellow a 100 gr skein for each color should be enough the crochet hook needed is a 5 mm
